newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China-owned Macau-based Nam Kwong Group sets loan.
newsitem.headline: China-owned Macau-based Nam Kwong Group sets loan.

text.p: The following syndicated loan
issue was announced by arranger CCIC Finance.
BORROWER NAM KWONG GROUP CO LTD
AMOUNT US$30 MLN TYPE TERM LOAN
MARGIN 6ML+87.5 MATURITY 5 YRS AVGE LIFE 3.75 YRS
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE LAUNCHED MID WK OCT 14
DRAWDOWN -- AVAIL 6 MTHS HOME CTRY CHINA/MACAU
REPAYMENT SIX SEMI-ANNUAL EQUAL INSTALMENTS AFTER 2.5 YRS'
GRACE PERIOD
GOV LAW HONG KONG REPLIES END OCT.96
NOTES THE BORROWER IS A GENERAL TRADING AGENT, ESTABLISHED IN
1949 IN MACAU, WHICH IS 100 PCT BENEFICIARY OWNED BY
CHINA'S MINISTRY OF FOREIGN TRADE AND ECONOMIC
COOPERATION. PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO FINANCE
INVESTMENTS IN MACAU AND CHINA AND FOR GENERAL WORKING
CAPITAL.
ARRANGERS BANQUE INDOSUEZ (BOOKS) AND CCIC FINANCE (AGENT &
BOOKS)
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-ARRANGERS & LEAD MGRS US$8 MLN+ 65 BP ALL-IN 104.83
CO-LEAD MGRS US$5 MLN+ 60 BP ALL-IN 103.50
MANAGERS US$3 MLN 55 BP ALL-IN 102.16
--Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
